website_summaries.verdict: Once you find the right size and break them in, chances are you will love the looks, comfort, and performance these shoes bring to your game.
pros: With responsive 5GEN insole cushioning and reliable spike-free traction, these shoes are built for comfort and stability
Women also rave about how great they look
cons: Chances are you'll have to go up at least one half size, as these shoes run small
The material is a bit stiff during the break-in period

customer_reviews.title: The new size fits great and I love them
customer_reviews.text: I have several pair of Skechers golf shoes, but these are the first water "proof" pair. I had to reorder 1/2 size bigger because they were tighter in the toes. The new size fits great and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A. Bullard

customer_reviews.title: I love the design of this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this shoe, however, it was narrow at the toe/front of the shoe. I have never had a problem with this before and a larger size wouldn't have helped. It tapered in and I still had room in the length. I did return them due to this issue.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Up until now my wife has just worn tennis shoes to play golf. Since she normally wears Sketchers, I ordered her these but a half size larger as has been suggested by others. That turned out to be exactly right; you need to add a half-size larger even if you normally wear Sketchers like my wife. She said she had no idea what a difference golf shoes make and her game has improved since she started wearing these shoes. She loves the comfort and more importantly, the fact that they are water proof in this wet Spring weather.
customer_reviews.author: Monty Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Much stiffer than other Skechers
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great, but they are much stiffer than other Skechers I've bought. I have 3 pairs of Skecher golf shoes, and this is the first time I was not able to wear them to walk 18 holes the first time I put them on. I changed socks mid-round but ended up playing barefoot the last 6 holes because of blisters on my heels. So unlike other Skechers, they have to be broken in or worn with blister prevention socks.
customer_reviews.author: CoastalReader

customer_reviews.title: loved this style shoe but the 9 1/2 that I ...
customer_reviews.text: loved this style shoe but the 9 1/2 that I normally wear was too snug and the cost for size 10 increased from $53 to $120 so wasn't worth buying size up.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Cute but run small
customer_reviews.text: Defiantly cute. Order half a size up for sure. Also, I ordered what I thought were white and blue and the shoes are more grey and blue.
customer_reviews.author: Techsavvygirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golf shoes for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, good-looking, and keeps the moisture out while letting my feet breathe. I love the spikes on the sole, simple and easy to clean at the course's shoe brush blocks. Have had lots of compliments on them. Really glad to have these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Weidner

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: These are made of a woven type fabric so they breathe nicely and accommodate my wide foot. I have bunions and they aren’t bothered at all, which is not common with a more structured shoe. The only issue is that they rub terribly on my lower ankle/heel area. I am hoping that by continuing to wear socks that cover that area and adding blister blockers that they will break in. They repel water well and other than my ankle/heel area issue my feet feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle P. Merritt

customer_reviews.title: I would love to tell you how wonderful this golf shoe is ...
customer_reviews.text: I would love to tell you how wonderful this golf shoe is but I can't because I didn't receive it. Instead I received a black and white shoe. I didn't send them back because the black and white pair fit and were comfortable and so I kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Iris the flower

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous ordering shoes on line but the price was right for a known brand. These shoes fit great! I wear a 6.5 to 7 so based on reviews, I ordered a 7 and I love the fit of them. The width across my toes is great and I have worn them twice for golfing now. I walk the course and these shoes are very comfortable. Not that it's important to the quality and fit, but I have received several compliments on the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nuttshell

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size up and they are perfect out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Already wore these for two rounds of golf and my feet were dry and very comfortable. Super stylish too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Feels great but too bulky for my skinny ankles
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. I found it to be too bulky looking for my skinny ankles. Plenty roomy in the toe box, I will just wear them for yard work.
customer_reviews.author: parlady

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Very comfortable and
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Very comfortable and, so far, waterproof. The reviews recommended a 1/2 size larger. I did so and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: I really like the looks of this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really like the looks of this shoe, very comfortable, size is true to my exact size. Cleats are soft ,however, I can actually step in my partner putting path without worry! Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: patti koether

customer_reviews.title: ... 5 star because the shoe is will made and beautiful.. bet snag but once i break it
customer_reviews.text: I give this one 5 star because the shoe is will made and beautiful.. bet snag but once i break it, it should fit well in the long ran. I am a walker in 18 hole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and got a half size bigger and they fit great.
customer_reviews.text: I listened to the reviews and got a half size bigger and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy inner soles. Great look and feel. Fits a little snug to start but feels stretchable.
customer_reviews.author: Josefa Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Played 9 holes in these shoes right out of the box, then 18 holes the following weekend with no problems at all. These shoes are very comfortable and I love the classic design.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Love these golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these golf shoes. I got a half size larger and they fit great with my socks. The color wasn’t my first choice, but they work.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The comfort is outstanding! They are like wearing slippers on the golf course.
customer_reviews.author: pattyr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were nice but a little too small. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the shoe but it runs way too small. Can not wear them.
customer_reviews.author: DLeBolt

customer_reviews.title: Not really waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Guaranteed to be waterproof for 2 years, lasted less than 1
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs smaller than other Skechers.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say I had to return them. They were too small. I have other skechers that fit fine. I guess I should have gotten a size bigger in the golf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: RUNS SMALL  Thankful for reviews to suggest 1/2 size larger which I did ...PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: Thankful for reviews to suggest 1/2 size larger which I did ...PERFECT FIT, stylish P.S. using the Amazon Locker system is terrific!
customer_reviews.author: campernut

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the shoe, but they are very stiff and difficult to pu on. I will be returning them since they are too small.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. Can't wait to try them on the course
customer_reviews.author: Cindinni

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but runs very small. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these and definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these and definitely recommend. Note I went 1/2 size larger than normal shoe for best fit. Also, although description is "white" it is more a silvery grey.
customer_reviews.author: SDG2

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1/2 size LARGER than usual. AVOID the hassles of returns and exchanges!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe but you MUST and I repeat buy 1/2 size bigger than you usually do. If you usually fit into Skechers 8.5 then buy a size 9 in this model. The issue is in the material and the fact that it doesn’t expand or break in like normal because of its superb waterproofing ability. I HIGHLY recommend this shoe for spring golf especially in the North East. My husband has said many times that if they made this in his size he might try getting away with it!
customer_reviews.author: Intervention Confidential

product_meta.title: Skechers Women's Go Golf Elite Ace Jacquard Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: Fusing together our fashion athletic looks from our successful skechers go walk series, we merge our lightweight, responsive 5gen cushioning foam and tpu grip outsole with a jacquard upper lace-up design.
